plugins.name: Export hide text
plugins.description:

Copies the selected frame, applies the suffix, and hides text and UI components meant to be hidden in the duplicate.

plugins.name: Human Design Map Builder
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps inside Figma.

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

It ends by copying all relevant sections to a target page (מפות מעודכנות) for final output.

No data is sent to external services, except for a success/failure status posted to a webhook for internal workflow tracking.

This plugin is tailored for a specific document structure and may not function properly outside that context.
plugins.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

137361.name: Human Design Map Builder
137361.description:

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

137361.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

plugins.name: Button State Builder
plugins.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button. Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like — then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states. We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.
plugins.tagline: Build perfect button states, effortlessly

plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: Nativ Localization
plugins.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
plugins.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

135216.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). plugins.name: Name Shame
plugins.description:
Name Shame is a lovingly vibe-coded plugin born from one designer’s deep-seated frustration with default layer names like “Rectangle 123” and “Group 87.” Instead of silently suffering, I decided to roast my own poor file hygiene—and now yours too.


This plugin scans your Figma file for default-named layers, serves up a spicy roast for each offender, and lets you rename them with beautifully ridiculous alternatives like “such_lazy” or “identity_crisis.” Use it for laughs, use it for cleanup, use it because your future self deserves better.


File hygiene matters. Might as well make it fun. 🎉

accepted.name: Aaron May
accepted.description:
Professional & Punchy
Creative Director with a love for design systems, clear UI, and a well-organized layer panel.

plugins.tagline: Scans bland layer names, dishes witty roasts and renames them with delightful absurdity

plugins.name: push-my-icons
plugins.description:
Push your Figma SVG icons to GitHub with ease.


This plugin helps you

  1. Automatically extract SVG nodes
  2. Upload them to your GitHub repository
  3. Generate a pull request with added/updated/removed icons


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin and fill in the following fields:
  2. GitHub personal access token
  3. GitHub repository URL
  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
plugins.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

134542.name: push-my-icons
134542.description:

This plugin helps you

  2. GitHub personal access token

  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
134542.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

plugins.name: Frames to Pages
plugins.description:
✨ About the Plugin


Organize your Figma files more efficiently!


This plugin moves each selected frame into its own new page automatically, helping you:


  1. Improve performance on heavy files.
  2. Make navigation faster and more intuitive.
  3. Keep versions and project sections clearly separated.


Perfect for large projects, collaborative teams, and anyone who values a clean and structured workspace.


💡 Why use this plugin?


As Figma projects grow, pages often become crowded with dozens (or hundreds) of frames.

This can cause:


  1. Slower loading times.
  2. Harder navigation and confusion for new collaborators.
  3. Increased risk of overwriting or losing important work.


By splitting frames into separate pages, your file becomes lighter, faster, and easier to maintain.


📚 Common Use Cases


  1. Large projects: Quickly organize dozens of screens into individual pages.


  1. Version management: Save different design versions separately without cluttering a single page.


  1. Developer handoff: Share organized sections with developers more easily.


  1. Team collaboration: Help new team members find what they need faster.


🛠️ How it works


  1. Select the frames you want to organize.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Choose whether to delete the original page or keep it.


Each selected frame will be placed into a brand new page, keeping its content intact.
plugins.tagline: Move each selected frame into its own new page automatically. Organize your Figma files easily.

plugins.name: Component repeater
plugins.description:
# Component Repeater


A Figma plugin that helps you create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images.


## What it does


This plugin analyzes your selection and creates a component that intelligently handles:


- Style variations (colors, effects, layout properties)

- Text content variations

- Image variations


When you have multiple similar elements that differ in styles or content, this plugin will:


1. Create a main component with variants for different styles

2. Create a separate component set for image variations

3. Replace all selected elements with instances of the component

4. Preserve the original text content and image placement


## How to use it


1. **Select similar elements**


- Select two or more groups or frames that have the same structure

- The plugin has a feature to help you find all similar elements from one selected node

- The elements can have different styles, text content, or images but should have the same layer structure


2. **Run the plugin**


- The plugin will analyze your selection and show variations in:

- Text content

- Colors and effects

- Images

- Layout properties


3. **Create the component**


- Click "Replace selection with a component"

- The plugin will create:

- A main component with style variants (if variations exist)

- A separate image component set (if images are used)

- Instances that preserve the original variations


4. **Finding similar elements**

- Select a single element

- Click "Find Similar Nodes" to select all elements with the same structure

- Use this to find more elements to include for replacement


## Tips


- The plugin works best with elements that have the same structure (same hierarchy of layers)

- Style variations are automatically detected and turned into variants

- Text content is preserved in each instance

- Images are turned into a swappable component

- Use the resize handle in the bottom right to adjust the plugin window size


## Requirements


- Works with groups and frames

- Selected elements must have the same layer structure

- Supports both direct images and image fills
plugins.tagline: Create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images

111831.name: Component repeater
111831.description:
# Component Repeater


A Figma plugin that helps you create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images.


## What it does


This plugin analyzes your selection and creates a component that intelligently handles:


- Style variations (colors, effects, layout properties)

- Text content variations

- Image variations


When you have multiple similar elements that differ in styles or content, this plugin will:


1. Create a main component with variants for different styles

2. Create a separate component set for image variations

3. Replace all selected elements with instances of the component

4. Preserve the original text content and image placement


## How to use it


1. **Select similar elements**


- Select two or more groups or frames that have the same structure

- The plugin has a feature to help you find all similar elements from one selected node

- The elements can have different styles, text content, or images but should have the same layer structure


2. **Run the plugin**


- The plugin will analyze your selection and show variations in:

- Text content

- Colors and effects

- Images

- Layout properties


3. **Create the component**


- Click "Replace selection with a component"

- The plugin will create:

- A main component with style variants (if variations exist)

- A separate image component set (if images are used)

- Instances that preserve the original variations


4. **Finding similar elements**

- Select a single element

- Click "Find Similar Nodes" to select all elements with the same structure

- Use this to find more elements to include for replacement


## Tips


- The plugin works best with elements that have the same structure (same hierarchy of layers)

- Style variations are automatically detected and turned into variants

- Text content is preserved in each instance

- Images are turned into a swappable component

- Use the resize handle in the bottom right to adjust the plugin window size


## Requirements


- Works with groups and frames

- Selected elements must have the same layer structure

- Supports both direct images and image fills
111831.tagline: Create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images

plugins.name: The Ultimate Table
plugins.description:
The Ultimate Table is a powerful Figma plugin that enables you to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.


Features

  1. Rearrange, remove, add, or duplicate columns and rows
  2. Drag to adjust column widths in header cells
  3. Automatic row height adjustment based on content
  4. Maintain linked tables across your design


Styling Options

  1. Customizable padding, margins, and borders
  2. Column text alignment controls
  3. Zebra striping support
  4. Header styling with sort/filter/search indicators
  5. Custom border radius
  6. Flexible font and size options


Smart Updates

  1. Master table controls for consistent styling


Need a quick start?

  1. Learn all there is to know in less than 10 minutes in this video tutorial
  2. Complete tutorial (Written & Video) at ultimate-table.com
plugins.tagline: Finally a plugin to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.

plugins.name: Components to Section
plugins.description:
Easily regroup all your master components into a section. Runs across all pages of your file

Plugin does not have UI to run.


How to use

Launch via cmd + / or go to plugin > Component to Section

Tab and choose

  1. Run on current page
  2. Run on all pages
  3. Set preferences


Preferences (User saved)

  1. Choose where to create the section (current page or new page)
  2. Choose the spacing between regrouped components


Why paid?

I'm a hobbyist and it's very difficult to write clean efficient code.

I have a day job and it's a good way to keep me motivated and work extra hours.

$2 is the cheapest a plugin can be sold on figma, I was happy with $0.99 but hey...


If this plugin starts selling regularly I will keep adding commands to make it even more powerful


Free stuff

If you are looking for free stuff, I have published two widget and they are currently used by more than 50K users


Help out ?

I'm in the London, UK and always keen to hear about fellow hackers, If you want to contribute to the plugin or have a suggestion feel free to contact me on edwardbattistini.com/contact

accepted.name: EdwardB
accepted.description: Product designer during the day. Super dad at night

plugins.name: Contrast ◈ | WCAG + APCA
plugins.description:
Get both WCAG and APCA contrast validation in one seamless tool. Contrast ◈ brings familiar Figma styling and workflows to accessibility testing, making it easy to check compliance during design rather than after handoff.


Key features:

  1. Dual standard support: Traditional WCAG guidelines plus modern APCA perceptual contrast
  2. Native Figma UI design patterns
  3. Quick selection options that fit naturally into your existing design process
  4. Perfect for teams transitioning between contrast standards
  5. Immediate feedback to catch accessibility issues early


Whether you're meeting current WCAG requirements or preparing for future perceptual contrast standards, Contrast ◈ keeps your workflow smooth while ensuring your designs are accessible to all users.
plugins.tagline: Familiar Figma based UI for quick color contrast check beyond WCAG basics

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

plugins.name: 画板自动编号 Auto Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin automates the numbering of selected Figma artboards, allowing you to customize the naming sequence with prefixes and suffixes. It supports multiple languages, enhancing your workflow efficiency and organization.


Function Introduction

  1. Automatically numbers selected artboards in Figma.
  2. Customizable naming with prefixes and suffixes.
  3. Supports multiple languages.
  4. Two naming sequences: left-to-right then top-to-bottom, or top-to-bottom then left-to-right.


How to Use

  1. Select the artboards you want to rename.
  2. Choose your preferred naming sequence.
  3. Optionally, add a prefix or suffix.
  4. Click "Apply Naming" to rename the selected artboards.


Notes

  1. Ensure artboards are selected before applying the naming operation.
  2. The plugin temporarily disables the apply button for 2 seconds to prevent accidental multiple clicks.


介绍

本插件自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号，支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名顺序。支持多种语言，提升您的工作效率和画板管理。


功能说明

  1. 自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号。
  2. 支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名。
  3. 支持多种语言。
  4. 两种命名顺序：从左到右再从上到下，或从上到下再从左到右。


使用方法

  1. 选择需要重新命名的画板。
  2. 选择您喜欢的命名顺序。
  3. 可选地添加前缀或后缀。
  4. 点击“应用命名”重新命名选中的画板。


注意事项

  1. 请确保在应用命名操作前已选中画板。
  2. 插件会在2秒内暂时禁用应用按钮，以防止意外的多次点击。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Automate artboard numbering with custom prefixes, suffixes, and multi-language support in Figma.

plugins.name: Not a Linker
plugins.description:
[Ru]

Not a Linker — это простой, но мощный плагин, который позволяет быстро копировать ссылки на выбранные фреймы и секции в ваших файлах Figma.


🎯 КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ:

• Копирование ссылок на один или несколько фреймов/секций

• Автоматическое форматирование: название фрейма + ссылка

• Чистый формат вывода для удобной передачи

• Работает как с фреймами, так и с секциями

• Автоматическое определение языка (поддержка 9 языков)

• Копирование в буфер обмена одним кликом


🚀 КАК РАБОТАЕТ:

1. Выберите один или несколько фреймов или секций

2. Запустите плагин из меню Plugins

3. Ссылки автоматически скопируются в буфер обмена


📋 ФОРМАТ ВЫВОДА:

Один фрейм:

Название фрейма

https://www.figma.com/file/...


Несколько фреймов:

Фрейм 1

https://www.figma.com/file/...

--

Фрейм 2

https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 ПОДДЕРЖИВАЕМЫЕ ЯЗЫКИ:

English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文


Идеально подходит для дизайнеров, которым нужно делиться конкретными фреймами с командой, клиентами или заинтересованными лицами. Экономьте время и оптимизируйте рабочий процесс с Not a Linker!


[En]

Not a Linker is a simple yet powerful plugin that allows you to quickly copy links to selected frames and sections in your Figma files.


🎯 KEY FEATURES:

• Copy links to single or multiple frames/sections

• Automatic formatting: frame name + link

• Clean output format for easy sharing

• Works with both frames and sections

• Automatic language detection (9 languages supported)

• One-click copying to clipboard


🚀 HOW IT WORKS:

1. Select one or more frames or sections

2. Run the plugin from Plugins menu

3. Links are automatically copied to your clipboard


📋 OUTPUT FORMAT:

Single frame:

Frame Name

https://www.figma.com/file/...


Multiple frames:

Frame 1

https://www.figma.com/file/...

--

Frame 2

https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 LANGUAGES SUPPORTED:

English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文


Perfect for designers who need to share specific frames with team members, clients, or stakeholders. Save time and streamline your workflow with Not a Linker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly copy frame and section links with automatic multilingual support

139731.description:

🎯 КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ:

• Чистый формат вывода для удобной передачи

• Работает как с фреймами, так и с секциями

• Автоматическое определение языка (поддержка 9 языков)

• Копирование в буфер обмена одним кликом


🚀 КАК РАБОТАЕТ:

1. Выберите один или несколько фреймов или секций

2. Запустите плагин из меню Plugins

3. Ссылки автоматически скопируются в буфер обмена


📋 ФОРМАТ ВЫВОДА:

Один фрейм:

Название фрейма

https://www.figma.com/file/...


Несколько фреймов:

Фрейм 1

https://www.figma.com/file/...

--

Фрейм 2

https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 ПОДДЕРЖИВАЕМЫЕ ЯЗЫКИ:

English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文


Идеально подходит для дизайнеров, которым нужно делиться конкретными фреймами с командой, клиентами или заинтересованными лицами. Экономьте время и оптимизируйте рабочий процесс с Not a Linker!


[En]

Not a Linker is a simple yet powerful plugin that allows you to quickly copy links to selected frames and sections in your Figma files.


🎯 KEY FEATURES:

• Copy links to single or multiple frames/sections

• Automatic formatting: frame name + link

• Clean output format for easy sharing

• Works with both frames and sections

• Automatic language detection (9 languages supported)

• One-click copying to clipboard


🚀 HOW IT WORKS:

1. Select one or more frames or sections

2. Run the plugin from Plugins menu

3. Links are automatically copied to your clipboard


📋 OUTPUT FORMAT:

Single frame:

Frame Name

https://www.figma.com/file/...


Multiple frames:

Frame 1

https://www.figma.com/file/...

--

Frame 2

https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 LANGUAGES SUPPORTED:

English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文


Perfect for designers who need to share specific frames with team members, clients, or stakeholders. Save time and streamline your workflow with Not a Linker!
139731.tagline: Quickly copy frame and section links with automatic multilingual support
